snippet: Even Republicans say his self-created crises distract from his accomplishments, and his governing style creates unnecessary difficulties....
abstract: Democrats and Republicans in Maine publicly air complaints about how Gov Paul R LePage has run state, following controversy over threatening voice mail LePage left Democratic lawmaker and his sweeping generalizations about race and state's heroin crisis; lawmakers single out in particularly his habit of having outbursts that distract from task of governing.
lead_paragraph: Even Republicans say his self-created crises distract from his accomplishments, and his governing style creates unnecessary difficulties.

headline.main: Support Wanes for Paul LePage, Maine’s Brash Governor
headline.print_headline: Maine’s Ever-Unfiltered Governor Frustrates Both Sides of the Aisle
